General.Name: Petronor E&P Ltd
General.Description: PetroNor E&P ASA operates as an independent oil and gas exploration and production company in West Africa. It holds exploration and production assets in offshore West Africa countries, which includes the PNGF Sud licenses in Congo Brazzaville, the A4 license in The Gambia, the Sinapa (Block 2) and Esperança (Blocks 4A and 5A) licenses in Guinea-Bissau, the Rufisque Offshore Profond and Senegal Offshore Sud Profond in Senegal, and OML-113 in Nigeria. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
